value.name: selfPing
value.description: You can no longer ping yourself through @someone.

value.name: commandOnly
value.description: Turns @someone into a command so @someone in between text does not work.

value.name: bypassOpt
value.description: Bypass opt and include people who have opted out of being pinged.

value.name: roleOnly
value.description:
Prevents members without certain roles to use @someone.
Specified by: `?config addRole <roleName>`
`?config removeRole <roleName>`
`?config roleList`

value.name: addRole
value.description: Adds a role to the list.

value.name: roleList
value.description: Displays all the roles that can use the command.

value.name: removeRole
value.description: Removes a role to the list.

value.name: addRoles
value.description: Displays the current list of roles that can use @someone.

value.name: pingedBy
value.description: Turns on/off the message that tells the person who got pinged who you are.

value.name: tips
value.description: Updates on the bot are often shown here.
